Hi NileRed,
I have some questions. For one, are you planning to do anything special for 100k subs? My second question is a long one. As I am a new chemistry youtuber, I was wondering if you have any tips to grow. I'm starting out with very few materials, (Full list at the bottom) and I can't really think of any videos to do, making it very hard to grow. I have no ideas on how to promote my channel, and I was wondering if you could help at all. I've been watching your videos for a while now, (just over a year), and you and other various chemistry youtubers have taken over my life, as chemistry channels are all I watch. And now, as for my third question, do you know any good free video editors for windows 10? I've been searching for a while now, but I can't find much.

If you took the time to read this all, then I sincerely thank you. I thank you more in advance if you decide to respond and answer my questions. Thanks for the help! (Maybe!)

Oh yeah, and as for my list of starting materials,
-Potassium Iodide
-Copper Sulfate
-Methylene Blue
-Sodium Hydroxide
-Potassium Hydroxide
-Potassium Permanganate
-Alum
-Dextrose
-Borax
-6 Liters of 3% Hydrogen Peroxide
-2 sets of 50-1000ml beakers
-One 500ml Erlenmeyer Flask
-A Canon PowerShot S95
-Alot of spare time
